title: Aagaya Sooriyanai Lyrics Samurai
stanzas:
Aagaaya sooriyanai
ottrai sadaiyil kattiyaval
nindraadum vinmeenai
netri suttiyil ottiyaval.
ival thaane erimalai alli
marudhaani pol poosiyaval

kodi naan un dhegam muttrum
suttri konda kodi naan.
en enna edhuvo.

kilithaan unai konjam
konjam koththi thinnum
kilithaan unai
konjum ennamo.

Aagaaya sooriyanai
ottrai sadaiyil kattiyaval
nindraadum vinmeenai
netri suttiyil ottiyaval.
neethaane erimalai alli
marudhaani pol poosiyaval

adiye en dhegam mutrum
sutri konda kodiye
un ennam ennavo.

sagiye enai konjam
konjam  koththi thinnum kiliye
ennai kollum ennamo.

kadhal pandhyil naame
unavuthaan unnum porule
unnai unnum vindhai ingaethaan.

kadhal paarvaiyil boomi veruthaan
margazhi verkkum
chiththirai kulirum
maaruthal ingaethaan.

un kulirukku idhamaai
enai adikkadi koluthu
en veyilukku sugamthaan
un vervaiyil nianithu

kadhal marandhavan
kaamam kadanthavan
thuravai thuranthadhum
sorgam vanthathu.

Aagaaya sooriyanai
ottrai sadaiyil kattiyaval
nindraadum vinmeenai
netri suttiyil ottiyaval.
neethaane erimalai alli
marudhaani pol poosiyaval

ennai kandathum
yaen nee oligiraai
dora bora malai sendraalum
thurathi varuvene.

unnai neenginaal engae selvathu
un  ullangaiyil regai kulle
olindhu kolvene.

adi kadhal vandhum
yaen kannaamoochi.
nee kandu kandu pidithaal
pin kaaman aatchi.

kaththi parithu nee
poovai thinikkiraai
baaram kuraindhathil
yaedho nimmadhi.

Aagaaya sooriyanai
ottrai sadaiyil kattiyaval
nindraadum vinmeenai
netri suttiyil ottiyaval.
ival thaane erimalai alli
marudhaani pol poosiyaval

adiye en dhegam mutrum
sutri konda kodiye
un ennam ennavo.

sagiye enai konjam
konjam  koththi thinnum kiliye
ennai kollum ennamo.
